name: SxS
description:
SxS is a top down shooter game where you kill a variety of enemies using your pistol, shotgun, smg and your trusted grenade launcher.

Enemies :

Zombies(Red) - Chases after you, can smell you from afar

Shooter(Blue) - Shoots bullets at you with pinpoint accuracy

Grenadier(Green) - Throw grenades at you, and can't be killed by grenades

Controls:

W-A-S-D - Move

1-3 - Cycle Weapon ( 1 - Pistol, 2 - Shotgun, 3 - SMG)

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Right Mouse Button - Fire grenade 

ESC - Pause

CAUTION!!!

When you first startup the game, would you kindly lower the volume in the sound option. I don't want your ears to bleed.
